description:
Some versions of libvirt (such as RHEL6's 0.10.2) require a port specification with a GlusterFS network disk, or they reject the disk with an "XML error: missing port for host" error.

We can provide a blank value, rather than omitting the field, which allows qemu to default to a reasonable port.
title: GlusterFS disk attach fails on older versions of libvirt

    libvirt: Provide a port field for GlusterFS network disks
    
    Some versions of libvirt (RHEL6's 0.10.2) require a port
    specification with a GlusterFS network disk, or they reject
    the disk with an "XML error: missing port for host" error.
    
    Provide port 24007 as part of the disk specification.
    
    Closes-Bug: #1254820
